lyrics:
[스트레이 키즈 "FNF" 가사]

[Verse 1: Bang Chan]
I see the ashes up in the sky
너의 목소리도 들리는 난
널 향해 손을 뻗어 봤자
얻는 건 공허한 마음

[Refrain: Changbin, Han]
겁 없이 달리다 널 놓칠까 봐, I shout, shout, shout
수없이 불러 봐도 난 다시 한번 더 외쳐
난 너의 그림자처럼 붙어 있어도 so far, far, far
영원히 이렇게 지낼 수 없는 난

[Pre-Chorus: I.N, Seungmin]
날 둘러싼, fauna and flora
먼지가 돼도 I really want you back
곁에 있던 fauna and flora
미안한 마음에 다시 쫓아가 now

[Chorus: Lee Know, I.N]
I'm catching uh-uh-uh-uh
Uh-uh-uh, uh-uh, uh-uh
Uh-uh-uh
Uh-uh-up
I'm catching uh-uh-uh-uh
Uh-uh-uh, uh-uh, uh-uh
Uh-uh-uh
Uh-uh-uh-up

[Verse 2: Felix, Hyunjin, Lee Know, Bang Chan]
I can feel the rage burning up inside my heart
Knowing you're no longer here
I can't stop thinking about what I could've done
But 'til this day, I live in fear
I fell apart, burnt to the ground
Got nothing but ashes in my eyes
It's black and cold as night
I wish I was there with you by your side
I don't know if I can sleep well tonight
They tell me to keep movin' on
Yeah, I'll never be the same
But I know that deep in my heart
I'll carry all the pain

[Pre-Chorus: Seungmin, I.N]
날 둘러싼, fauna and flora
먼지가 돼도 I really want you back
곁에 있던 fauna and flora
미안한 마음에 다시 쫓아가 now

[Refrain: Han, Changbin]
겁 없이 달리다 널 놓칠까 봐, I shout, shout, shout
수없이 불러 봐도 난 다시 한번 더 외쳐
난 너의 그림자처럼 붙어 있어도 so far, far, far
영원히 이렇게 지낼 수 없는 난

[Chorus: Lee Know, Bang Chan]
I'm catching uh-uh-uh-uh
Uh-uh-uh, uh-uh, uh-uh
Uh-uh-uh
Uh-uh-up
I'm catching uh-uh-uh-uh
Uh-uh-uh, uh-uh, uh-uh
Uh-uh-uh
Uh-uh-uh-up

[Bridge: Seungmin, Hyunjin]
밤하늘을 봐도
난 눈을 감아도, oh
너밖에 안 보여
달려가 쫓아가 불가능해도, oh

[Outro: Lee Know, Bang Chan, Felix]
I'm catching up (Oh)
I'm catching up (좀만 기다려, oh)
I'm catching up (I'm catching up, uh-oh)
달려가 쫓아가 불가능해도, oh
imageDescription: A silhouette of a person running towards a fading sunset. The sky is filled with swirling ashes, symbolizing the pain and emptiness felt by the lyrics. The person's outstretched hand is reaching towards something just out of reach, representing the longing and desperation expressed in the song.
